page.title: 12 Rose Queen Day
page.content: Every year Leven Civic Week starts off with the crowning of the Rose Queen. After she is crowned she leads the parade of coloured floats and people dressed in fancy dress costumes down Leven High Street. I am in the majorettes and we were taking part in the parade.On Friday night we practised our street parade until it was perfect. The next morning, Saturday the 15th June we met at Denbeath Scout hall and put our costumes on.Before going to Leven we did a display for the scouts Nicola Mcintosh was crowned Rose Queen and then her cavalcade made its way through the town followed by the floats.There was one carrying a jazz band,a Mad Hatter's tea party,a pirate ship with a damsel in distress but Scoonie Church won with their Muppet show.
